p: To investigate the antioxidant effects of the different wampee extracts, H 2O 2-induced hydroxyl radicals were detected in wampee extract-treated cells by using DCFH, which can be oxidized to a highly fluorescent DCF by hydroxyl radicals [ 27]. Due to HGF's relative strong tolerance to H 2O 2 shown in a previous study [ 26], a relative high concentration of H 2O 2 (1 mM) was used in the present study. The HGF cells were treated with the different wampee extracts and H 2O 2 in combination, and the peel extract prevented the increase in DCF fluorescence intensity significantly at 2 h, while the pulp and leaf extracts suppressed the DCF fluorescence intensity at 3 h. And there was no statistical significance in the attenuation of DCF fluorescence intensity in the HGF cells by seed extract ( Figure 4).
